title: Fly Necklace
description:
Incomplete silver necklace composed of 10 silver flies and 22 small circular undecorated beads as dividers. The necklace is an interesting example of a well-known design in the 18th Dynasty and is in unusually good condition considering the material. 
Condition: Preserved portion excellent condition. 5 of the flies are intact; the other 5 are more or less incomplete. Dividers modern.
credit_line: Gift of the Egypt Exploration Fund

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
